metadata.title: CVE-2020-1766 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Due to improper handling of uploaded images it is possible in very unlikelyand rare conditions to force the agents browser to execute maliciousjavascript from a special crafted SVG file rendered as inline jpg file.This issue affects: ((OTRS)) Community Edition 5.0.x version 5.0.39 andprior versions; 6.0.x version 6.0.24 and prior versions. OTRS 7.0.x version7.0.13 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
